articles.title: Metroid Prime 4 gets more details on Vi-O-La motorcycle gameplay - Nintendo Everything

articles.title: Black Ops 7 finally addressing skill-based matchmaking with new playlist in beta - Dexerto
articles.description: Black Ops 7’s beta will introduce Open Moshpit, a standalone multiplayer playlist in which “skill consideration is drastically reduced”

articles.title: Where Google Wallet state IDs are available on Android [Updated] - 9to5Google
articles.description: States across the US are slowly rolling out support for adding your driver’s license or ID to the Google Wallet app on Android.

articles.title: Nintendo issues October 2025 Switch 1 backwards compatibility fixes for Switch 2, full list - Nintendo Everything
articles.description: October has rolled in, and as part of that, a new wave of backwards compatibility fixes are available for Nintendo Switch 1 games on Switch 2. You may remember that both systems received a new firmware update this week. We mentioned that there could be backwa…

articles.title: Famously useless Pokémon card sees $100 price spike in just two weeks - wargamer.com
articles.description: Magikarp may be appalling in battle, but Pokémon TCG collectors love the Paldea Evolved Magikarp IR card so much, it's now worth over $400!
